column1: agnes m. ""peg"" ford| agnes m. peg ford (nee pease)
column6: 2015. mrs. ford was a womens army corps veteran. beloved wife of the late george e. ford. devoted mother of michael d. ford
column8: the late darren e. ford and the late douglas e. ford. dear sister of shirley jennings
column9: gi. gi pease and kass verkade. loving grandmother of 8 grandchildren and 5 great-grandchildren. relatives and friends are invited to her viewing on tuesday from 9:30 10:45 am at st. charles borromeo church
column12: where a mass of christian burial will be celebrated at 11:00 am. burial will follow in st. marys cemetery
column13: williamstown. in lieu of flowers contributions may be made to shriners hospital for children
